Description.Name: You Should See the Other Pilot!
Description.Details: Darius watches as the shuttle docks with the Argo. It's been a long haul with the Commander away at LAM training, so hopefully with their arrival back on board things can get back to normal. A MedTech disembarks the shuttle and heads over to Darius, "Are you Darius, XO of the Argo?" Darius nods, "Affirmative. How can I help you?" The MedTech shoves a datapad at Darius, "Sign here, please. He's all yours now." Darius looks down at the datapad and sees a release form for a wounded passenger being transported to the Argo: Commander {COMMANDER.FirstName} {COMMANDER.LastName}, wounded during LAM Flight Training; Current Status: Stable, "What the hell happened?" The MedTech shrugs, "Can't really say, sir. Scuttlebutt has it that your commander tried to outmanuever one of the other cadets in an attempt at top marks or something, and there was a mid-air collision. Pretty lucky to be alive if you ask me. In any event, I was instructed to get them safely here, and I have done that. Now it's up to you to nurse them back to full health." Darius signs the release form as a hover-gurney floats over with the Commander strapped in, obviously drugged to the max, Darius pulls a paper free that was clutched in their hand. Reading it, it would appear the Commander at least passed their training, just not in one piece. An Argo MedTech handling the hover-gurney speaks up, "Uh, sir... where shall I take the Commander?"

Description.Name: Heal Naturally
Description.Details: [No MedTechs to spare]

Description.Name: Heal Naturally
Description.Details:
Darius looks at the MedTech calmly, "Whilst I would love to spend the Company's resources to try and expedite the Commander's recovery time, we just cannot afford to do so at this time.  They'll just have to accept the standard treatment the rest of the crew gets."

The MedTech nods, "Understood.  I'll will allocate the Commander a standard medical bed for recovery."

Description.Name: Assign MedTech
Description.Details: [MedBay 2 Available]

Description.Name: MedBay2
Description.Details:
Darius looks from the Commander to the MedTech and sighs, "What good is having an upgraded MedBay if we don't use the resources to try and expedite the Commander's recovery time?  Get them a dedicated MedTech to assist with their recovery."

The MedTech nods, "Understood sir.  I'll have the Commander allocated a MedTech in MedBay 2 for recovery."
